amendment.description: To improve the provisions on global pathogen surveillance.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1159 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1159 proposed by Senator Lugar to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9162-9166; text: CR S9164) To improve the provisions on global pathogen surveillance.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1159 proposed by Senator Lugar to Amendment SA 1136.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1159 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
